data.name: BLOODZ
data.detailed_description:
BLOODZ is an indie action game set in a world dominated by zombies.

STORY
A group of scientists went to do research in an abandoned district, they obtained very important information about the zombie virus, unfortunately during the research they came across enemy troops. As a trained mercenary, you will have to find scientists and reclaim research, but it will not be an easy task, you will come across enemy soldiers and hordes of zombies along the way.

Explore locations, collect equipment, solve puzzles and eliminate enemies!

FEATURES
• Realistic graphics
• Dynamic action
• Interaction with the environment

data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1600 / Intel Core i5 6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X / Intel i5-8600K or newer
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 or better / AMD Radeon RX 6600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, Adult Content.
